mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rfid_inventory (BZHH, QSKH, ZZKH, SSBM, ZT, BZXH, CPDM) VALUES (#{bzhh}, #{qskh}, #{zzkh}, #{ssbm}, #{zt}, #{bzxh}, #{cpdm})
mapper.update: UPDATE rfid_inventory e SET e.zt = 5,e.ssbm = ( select roa.sqbm from RFID_INVENTORY_OUT rio,RFID_ORDER_APPLICATION roa where rio.ckdh = #{ckdh} and rio.sqdh = roa.sqdh ) where e.bzxh in (select riod.bzhm from RFID_INVENTORY_OUT_DETAIL riod where riod.ckdh = #{ckdh} and riod.dw = 1) or e.bzhh in (select riod.bzhm from RFID_INVENTORY_OUT_DETAIL riod where riod.ckdh = #{ckdh} and riod.dw = 2)
mapper.select: select * from rfid_inventory ri, rfid_inventory_in_detail riid where ri.ssbm = #{glbm} and riid.bzhh = ri.bzhh and riid.bzxh = #{bzxh} order by ri.bzhh

select CONCAT(CONCAT(ri.qskh, '-'), ri.zzkh) from rfid_inventory ri
where ((ri.qskh <= CONCAT(${sf}, lpad(${qskh}, 10, '0')) and ri.qskh >= CONCAT(${sf}, lpad(${zzkh}, 10, '0'))) or (ri.zzkh <= CONCAT(${sf}, lpad(${zzkh}, 10, '0')) and ri.zzkh >= CONCAT(${sf}, lpad(${qskh}, 10, '0')))) and ri.zt <> 6 union select re.kh from RFID_ERI re
where re.bzhh is null and re.kh >= CONCAT(${sf}, lpad(${qskh}, 10, '0')) and re.kh <= CONCAT(${sf}, lpad(${zzkh}, 10, '0'))

with o as ( select nvl(lag(e) over (order by n), minn) st, nvl(n, maxn) en from ( select lag(kh, 1) over (partition by sf order by kh) n, kh e, min(kh) over(partition by sf) minn, max(kh) over(partition by sf) maxn from rfid_eri where sf = ${sf} and bzhh is null and zt <> 2 ) where nvl(e -n -1 , 1) <> 0 or n is null union select qskh st, zzkh en from rfid_inventory where qskh >= concat(${sf}, '0000000000') and zzkh <= concat(${sf}, '9999999999') and zt <> 6) select concat(${sf}, lpad(nvl2(qskd, mod((qskd + 1), 10000000000) , 0), 10, '0')) qskd, concat(${sf}, lpad(mod(zzkd - 1, 10000000000), 10, '0')) zzkd from ( select lag(en, 1) over (order by st ) qskd, st zzkd, en from o ) where zzkd > ${sf} * 10000000000 and zzkd - nvl2(qskd, qskd + 1, ${sf} * 10000000000) - 1>= ${capacity} union select concat(${sf}, lpad(nvl2(max(o.en), mod(max(o.en) + 1, 10000000000), 0), 10, '0')), concat(${sf}, '9999999999') from o

with o as ( select ri.bzhh, count(*) n from rfid_inventory ri, rfid_eri re where re.zt = 1 and ri.qskh <= re.kh and ri.zzkh >= re.kh and ri.rwh = #{rwh} group by ri.bzhh) select min(ri2.bzhh) from rfid_inventory ri2, o where ri2.bzhh = o.bzhh(+) and ri2.rwh = #{rwh} and nvl(o.n, 0) < #{capacity}
select NVL(sum(riod.sjsl),0) from RFID_INVENTORY_OUT rio,RFID_INVENTORY_OUT_DETAIL riod where riod.ckdh = rio.ckdh and rio.cpdm = #{cpdm} and rio.ssbm = #{ssbm} and rio.zt = 1

SELECT 1 AS DW, NULL AS bzhh, e.bzxh, MIN(E.QSKH) AS qskh, MAX(E.ZZKH) AS zzkh FROM RFID_INVENTORY E LEFT JOIN RFID_PRODUCT PP ON PP.CPDM = E.CPDM WHERE E.QSKH >= to_number(#{qskh}) AND E.ZZKH <= to_number(#{zzkh}) AND PP.CPDM = #{cpdm} AND E.ZT = #{zt} GROUP BY E.BZXH HAVING MOD(COUNT(1), 10) = 0 UNION SELECT 2 AS DW, e1.bzhh, e1.bzxh,QSKH , ZZKH FROM RFID_INVENTORY E1 WHERE E1.ZT = #{zt} AND e1.qskh >= to_number(#{qskh}) AND e1.zzkh <= to_number(#{zzkh}) AND e1.cpdm = #{cpdm} AND E1.BZXH IN (SELECT E.BZXH FROM RFID_INVENTORY E LEFT JOIN RFID_PRODUCT PP ON PP.CPDM = E.CPDM WHERE E.QSKH >= to_number(#{qskh}) AND E.ZZKH <= to_number(#{zzkh}) AND PP.CPDM = #{cpdm} AND E.ZT = #{zt} GROUP BY E.BZXH HAVING MOD(COUNT(1), 10) != 0) ORDER BY bzxh, bzhh
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rfid_eri e, rfid_inventory i WHERE e.bzhh = i.bzhh AND i.ssbm = #{glbm} AND i.zt <> 6 AND e.zt = 1 AND e.clxxbfid IS NULL
